title: Bodhi Tree Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Thai, Western, Juice bar
description: Spacious restaurant with room for rent, in old town on a quiet side street since early-2015. Serves both Thai style and Western food plus smoothies, juices. Makes its own vegan milk, yogurt, mayonnaise, salad sauces and dips. Directions: Rachadamnoen Rd Soi 4, turn left into Soi 4 looking from Thapae Gate, walk till the very end of the Soi, then turn left. Not to be confused with the defunct Bodhi Zhen.
